verses.verse: In you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, I take refuge. <S%H2620><s%> Let me never <S%H408><s%> be disappointed. <S%H954><s%> Deliver <S%H6403><s%> me in your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Bow down <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me. <S%H5337><s%> Deliver me speedily. <S%H4120><s%> Be to me a strong <S%H4581><s%> rock, <S%H6697><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> of defense <S%H4686><s%> to save me. <S%H3467><s%>
For you are my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> therefore for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake lead <S%H5148><s%> me and guide me. <S%H5148><s%>
Pluck me out <S%H3318><s%> of the net <S%H7568><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have laid secretly <S%H2934><s%> for me, <S%H4581><s%> for you are my stronghold.
Into your hand <S%H3027><s%> I commend <S%H6485><s%> my spirit. <S%H7307><s%> You redeem <S%H6299><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, God <S%H410><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%>
I hate <S%H8130><s%> those who regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities, <S%H1892><s%> but I trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

I will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for you have seen <S%H7200><s%> my affliction. <S%H6040><s%> You have known <S%H3045><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in adversities. <S%H6869><s%>
You have not shut me up <S%H5462><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%> You have set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large place. <S%H4800><s%>

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, for I am in distress. <S%H6887><s%> My eye, <S%H5869><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and my body <S%H990><s%> waste <S%H6244><s%> away with grief. <S%H3708><s%>

For my life <S%H2416><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with sorrow, <S%H3015><s%> my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing. <S%H585><s%> My strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H3782><s%> because of my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> My bones <S%H6106><s%> are wasted away. <S%H6244><s%>

Because of all my adversaries <S%H6887><s%> I have become utterly contemptible <S%H2781><s%> to my neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> <S%H3966><s%> A fear <S%H6343><s%> to my acquaintances. <S%H3045><s%> Those who saw <S%H7200><s%> me on <S%H2351><s%> the street fled from me. <S%H5074><s%>
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> from their hearts <S%H3820><s%> like a dead man. <S%H4191><s%> I am like broken <S%H6><s%> pottery. <S%H3627><s%>

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the slander <S%H1681><s%> of many, <S%H7227><s%> terror <S%H4032><s%> on every side, <S%H5439><s%> while they conspire <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me, <S%H2161><s%> they plot to take away <S%H3947><s%> my life. <S%H5315><s%>
But I trust <S%H982><s%> in you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. I said, <S%H559><s%> "You are my God. <S%H430><s%>"
My times <S%H6256><s%> are in your hand. <S%H3027><s%> Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and from those who persecute me. <S%H7291><s%>
Make your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> on your servant. <S%H5650><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> me in your loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%>

Let me not be disappointed, <S%H954><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you. <S%H7563><s%> Let the wicked be disappointed. <S%H954><s%> Let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be mute, <S%H481><s%> which speak <S%H1696><s%> against the righteous <S%H6662><s%> insolently, <S%H6277><s%> with pride <S%H1346><s%> and contempt. <S%H937><s%>

Oh how great <S%H7227><s%> is your goodness, <S%H2898><s%> which you have laid up <S%H6845><s%> for those who fear <S%H3373><s%> you, <S%H6466><s%> which you have worked for those who take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in you, <S%H1121><s%> before the sons of men! <S%H120><s%>

In the shelter <S%H5643><s%> of your presence <S%H6440><s%> you will hide <S%H5641><s%> them from the plotting <S%H7407><s%> of man. <S%H376><s%> You will keep them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a dwelling <S%H5521><s%> away from the strife <S%H7379><s%> of tongues. <S%H3956><s%>
Praise <S%H1288><s%> be to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he has shown me his marvelous <S%H6381><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in a strong <S%H4692><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

As for me, <S%H559><s%> I said in my haste, <S%H2648><s%> "I am cut off <S%H1629><s%> from before <S%H5048><s%> your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>" Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> you heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions <S%H8469><s%> when I cried to you. <S%H7768><s%>

Oh love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you his saints! <S%H2623><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H5341><s%> the faithful, <S%H539><s%> and fully <S%H3499><s%> recompenses <S%H7999><s%> him who behaves <S%H6213><s%> arrogantly. <S%H1346><s%>
Be strong, <S%H553><s%> and let your heart <S%H3824><s%> take courage, <S%H2388><s%> all you who hope <S%H3176><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
